EmailTemplate.name: FP PH Send ONB Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Account} - Get Activated on foodpanda Now!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Partner,
Welcome to foodpanda! We are excited to have you on board with us!
Your menu has now been completed by our content team.
You can view your menu via your Restaurant Portal account here. Your Restaurant Portal login credentials are provided in a separate email titled "Welcome to Restaurant Portal" that has already been sent to you.
If you did not receive an earlier email titled 'Welcome to Restaurant Portal', please fill out this form. Click on General Inquiry > Restaurant Portal Access > First Time Application to get a Restaurant Portal account.
Please click on this link to be on-boarded on foodpanda! https://FoodpandaSG.formstack.com/forms/welcomemenudh_ph?OID={!Case.OpportunityId__c}&OStg=&OName=&OWID=&Cdate=
Sincerely,
Your foodpanda Partner Care Team
